fullText: Dan Lauria brings gruff authenticity to his portrayal of the legendary Green Bay Packers coach, but the play itself fumbles in its attempt to find dramatic coherence.
dtliExcerpt: Dan Lauria brings gruff authenticity to his portrayal of the legendary Green Bay Packers coach, but the play itself fumbles in its attempt to find dramatic coherence.
